sentence: DICK'S Sporting Goods Inc.DKS is slated to report first-quarter fiscal 2015 results on May 19.
In the last quarter, the company had delivered a positive earnings surprise of 6.6%.
Let's see how things are shaping up for this announcement.
Our proven model shows that DICK'S Sporting is likely to beat earnings estimates this season as it has the right combination of the two key ingredients.
Zacks ESP:Earnings ESP for DICK'S Sporting is currently pegged at +3.77%.
This is because the Most Accurate estimate of 55 cents stands above the Zacks Consensus Estimate of 53 cents.
A favorable Zacks ESP serves as a meaningful and leading indicator of a likely positive earnings surprise.
Zacks Rank: DICK'S Sporting currently carries a Zacks Rank #3 (Hold).
Note that stocks with a Zacks Rank #1 (Strong Buy), 2 (Buy) or 3 have a significantly higher chance of beating earnings estimates.
Conversely, we caution against stocks with a Zacks Rank #4 and 5 (Sell-rated stocks) going into the earnings announcement, especially when the company is seeing negative estimate revisions.
DICK'S Sporting's Zacks Rank #3 and positive ESP make us reasonably confident of an earnings beat.
What is Driving the Better-than-Expected Earnings?
DICK'S Sporting has outperformed the Zacks Consensus Estimate by an average of 1.6% over the past four quarters, delivering a positive surprise in almost every quarter.
Shares of the company have been continuing their upward trajectory with the successful expansion of DICK'S Sporting's omni-channel network, powerful marketing and merchandising strategies.
The company's growth prospects appear promising, given its strategic measures focused on consolidating store base and using technology to provide better services to customers.
The strong fundamentals along with a solid earnings history also encouraged management to provide an optimistic outlook for fiscal 2015.
Considering all these factors, we remain optimistic about the company's upcoming results.

Here are some other companies you may want to consider as our model shows that these have the right combination of elements to post an earnings beat this quarter:

Urban Outfitters Inc. URBN has an Earnings ESP of +3.33% and a Zacks Rank #2 (Buy).
Lowe's Companies Inc. LOW has an Earnings ESP of +2.70% and a Zacks Rank #3.
The Home Depot, Inc. HD has an Earnings ESP of +0.87% and a Zacks Rank #3.
